p: Cumulative inbreeding depression was considered as the product of pregermination and postgermination fitness and was calculated as the product of seed-set rate * seedpod weight. Cumulative ID estimates were 0.95, 0.61, and 0.36 for selfed individuals, full-siblings, and half-siblings, respectively (Fig. 4) and LE ranged from 11.98 to 7.11 for selfed plants to half-siblings (Table 3).
